t: Here I Am by Sapp, Marvin (2010) Audio CD - Amazon.com Music
s: I would like to say I love this album of Marvin Sapp. I play it everyday in my car and at work. I hardly listen to the radio only from time to time. This CD he has put out has inspired me and lifted me so much, all I can do is "PRAISE GOD FOR WHAT HE HAS DONE FOR ME".

t: I Win: CDs & Vinyl - Marvin Sapp

t: Marvin Sapp - I Believe - Amazon.com Music
s: Just get this CD, it's truly a blessing. The lyrics and the overall sound on this album is just great. Marvin did a great job on this one. ... This song sparks up so much faith, and this song will bless your soul and it have mine if you just believe. listen to it for free on youtube and iyou probably won't hesitate buying it.
